name: overseerr
description: Overseerr is a user-friendly request management system built to interact with Radarr, Sonarr, and Plex. It lets users request content for download and automates approvals and metadata fetching.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Allow users to search and request movies or TV shows for addition to your media

features.title: Radarr And Sonarr Integration
features.description: Automatically send approved requests to download managers for processing and monitoring

features.title: Approval Workflows
features.description: Configure automatic approval or require admin review based on user permissions and quotas

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync with Plex libraries to show what content is already available and prevent duplicate requests

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create accounts with different permission levels to control who can request and approve content

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts via email, Discord, Slack, or other services when requests are submitted or fulfilled
